xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 17 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 06:08 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 09:15 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 09:18 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu 09:19 <bvancea> still busy with phenotips? 09:19 <sdumitriu> Hey 09:19 <sdumitriu> Yep 09:19 <sdumitriu> Why? 09:19 <bvancea> just curious 09:19 <bvancea> do we have an time set for the hangout? 09:20 <sdumitriu> No, either today late or tomorrow early 09:20 <bvancea> I'm not sure if it's decided when to have it 09:20 <bvancea> okay 09:20 <sdumitriu> I'll check if Marc is at the office today 09:21 <bvancea> okay 09:21 <bvancea> well, I'm playing around with the new queries 09:21 <bvancea> replacing the old sql queries with the new stuff I've added 09:22 <sdumitriu> And, does it work fine? 09:22 <sdumitriu> Anything broken so far? 09:22 <bvancea> well, currently I have some queries which take variants out of the index 09:22 <bvancea> and some from the databse 09:22 <bvancea> it works weird 09:23 <bvancea> and for some some reason I have the INFO_* fields for variants set as multivalued on the solr schema 09:24 <bvancea> and the VariantRecord class in Medsavant does not 09:24 <bvancea> so I did something not very awesome 09:25 <bvancea> I took the first string in the multivalued array and used that for the value 09:25 <bvancea> I think those fields can be changed to single valued fields 09:53 <Jim_> has joined #medsavant 10:48 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 11:01 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 11:19 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 11:25 <sdumitriu1> Marc's at the lab 11:25 <sdumitriu1> So we can have the hangout today 11:25 <sdumitriu1> +1 if you're available 11:26 <sdumitriu1> misko___, Jim_, bvancea, mcupak_afk 11:27 <bvancea> +1 12:04 <mfiume> has joined #medsavant 12:53 <Jim_> has joined #medsavant 14:18 <sdumitriu1> Hm, so Miro isn't here... 14:22 <bvancea> seems so 14:25 <bvancea> should we maybe try to email him? 14:25 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:26 <bvancea> did you email? or should I? 14:26 <sdumitriu1> mfiume: Can you send Miro an email? 14:32 <mfiume> what time shouold we do it? 14:32 <mfiume> i need to step out for an hour 14:32 <sdumitriu1> 15:00 14:32 <mfiume> 3:45? 4? 14:32 <sdumitriu1> When do you have to go? 14:32 <sdumitriu1> Too late, that's 1 AM for Bogdan 14:32 <sdumitriu1> Hm, we'd better leave it for tomorrow morning 14:33 <sdumitriu1> 11:00 AM 14:33 <mfiume> im having a realy bad time with sinus infection, was going to go to drugstore now 14:33 <mfiume> i can go through a meeting now 14:34 <bvancea> hmm 14:34 <bvancea> hmmm 14:34 <bvancea> tomorrow then? 14:34 <sdumitriu1> +1 for tomorrow 14:35 <bvancea> do you think it will take more than 1 hour? 14:35 <mfiume> the meeting? 14:35 <mfiume> no 14:35 <bvancea> yes 14:35 <bvancea> tomorrow I'll be available until 12:00 14:35 <mfiume> ok lets do 11-12 14:36 <bvancea> I've got the graduation prom later the evening 14:36 <bvancea> sure, sounds good 14:36 <sdumitriu1> OK, I'll send an email 14:36 <bvancea> cool 14:58 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 15:22 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 15:26 <sdumitriu1> Hey mcupak, we were looking for you 15:26 <sdumitriu1> We've set the hangout for tomorrow (see the email) 15:27 <mcupak> hey sdumitriu1, yeah, I've seen it, sounds good 15:34 <misko__> has joined #medsavant
